name: Aymen Bareche
summary: Senior Full Stack Engineer with 9+ years of experience delivering full-stack solutions using Vue, TypeScript, Node.js, and modern DevOps tooling. Proven ability to take ownership of complex projects, lead initiatives, and drive technical excellence across teams.

highlights: Spearheaded the complete development of major features, leading full-stack implementation from backend REST APIs to modern, performant Vue-based UIs.
Independently delivered complex projects across infrastructure, frontend, and backend layers, demonstrating autonomy and technical breadth.
Revitalized a legacy frontend application, improving performance by 15–20% and enabling faster iteration through scalable architecture and cleaner code.
Proactively expanded into backend engineering (Ruby on Rails) to unlock cross-functional delivery, owning backend workflows and features.
Delivered business-critical initiatives that improved agent productivity, seller insights, and legal compliance.
Drove internal documentation standards and support tooling that empowered other teams to self-serve and troubleshoot effectively.
Recognized with multiple company awards for exceptional ownership, initiative, and innovation.
Led development efforts across multiple major Vue.js projects, contributing to scalable architecture, modularization, and UI consistency aligned with the design system.

Took full ownership of refactoring a legacy project by modernizing core flows, redesigning layouts, and introducing new features — resulting in improved usability, higher conversion rates, and smoother cross-squad collaboration.
Continuously maintained up-to-date technical and tracking documentation to support cross-squad collaboration and knowledge transfer.
Conducted technical interviews, helping hire two top candidates after extensive screening rounds.
Actively contributed to engineering culture via knowledge-sharing sessions, engineering all-hands, and cross-team collaboration.
Developed backend and frontend features for an internal CMS, using Node.js, Express, Vue.js, Vuex, and REST APIs.
Migrated parts of a legacy Angular app to Vue.js, improving maintainability and performance.
Built and deployed multiple Smart TV apps (Samsung, LG, Alliance), serving millions of users, with integrated ads and custom tracking for analytics and engagement.
Delivered a high-traffic HbbTV app providing full VOD access to the TRT network.
Set up CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, integrated Sentry for error monitoring, and wrote tests using Mocha, Chai, and Istanbul.
Worked in Agile Scrum and Kanban teams using Jira, Confluence, Docker, and AWS.
Refactored a legacy PHP codebase into a modular MVC architecture, improving the reliability and maintainability of the white-label insurance platform.
Developed new features using JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, and AJAX, integrated with REST APIs and MySQL.
Built internal tools to automate workflows for operations staff, including a cloud-based document printing system and a document scanning + auto-fill utility.
Maintained and extended WordPress modules, applied SEO practices, and managed deployments on DigitalOcean.
Collaborated using Git, Trello, and Agile Kanban.

additionalInformation: Permanent resident of Germany (Niederlassungserlaubnis) – Work authorization granted.
